description.value:
@Compendium[pf1.spells.2zyr6klf97jyr5ng]{Pass without Trace}

The subject or subjects of this spell do not leave footprints or a scent trail while moving. Tracking the subjects is impossible by nonmagical means.

contextNotes.text: Pass Without Trace: The subject or subjects of this spell do not leave footprints or a scent trail while moving. Tracking the subjects is impossible by nonmagical means.
